snippet: Household wealth increased for the first time in three quarters despite the largest decline in housing wealth in more than a year.
lead_paragraph: Household wealth increased for the first time in three quarters despite the largest decline in housing wealth in more than a year.

headline.seo: Household Wealth Increased Last Quarter Behind Stock Surge
headline.main: Stock Surge Reverses Trend in Wealth of U.S. Households
headline.print_headline: Stock Surge Reverses Trend In Wealth of U.S. Households
